ygData.subject: Re: Soulbinders
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks!!! ... soulbinder in every city. ... been ... confuse ... Knowledge. ... 14/07/2003 ... Service.
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks!!!





--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Wulfric Rennison" <wulftech@e...>
wrote:
> I believe the soulbinder is in South Qeynos. But yes, there is a
soulbinder in every city.
>
> WR
>
>
>

> From: bouywunder
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com

> Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Soulbinders
>
>
> Is there a binder in every city? Particularly Qeynos?
>
>
>

wrote:
